Description.Text:
Position We are placed at the south access of the town, in a pleasant and sunny area, near 100 meters to the local bus stop. We are near 300 paces near to the centre of Pinzolo and to the sports area of “la Pineta”(ice skating stadium, cross country skiing lit up area, riding ground, football stadium, tennis court fields and bowls playing ground) and we are near 1 km to the Pinzolo’s skiing cableways.
Restaurant Breakfast buffet.
Outside
Lobby
More Informations Our hotel is provided with rooms and access for disable persons and gives to our guests several facilities as fax services, internet point, meeting areas, bar room, large garden, private parking area and skiing storing area.
